en.title: FusionExcel Making Inroads to Brazil!
en.content:
REPORT BY AUSTRALIA COUNTRY LICENSEE VASU. 

PD Rachel Thomas has just completed a 10 days visit to Brazil with Australia Country Licensee Vasu, developing new markets in the major cities of Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo. Australian FE member Michelle Vianna who joined the FE network business at the Melbourne EXPO last November crossed the Atlantic Ocean earlier on March 09th to bring the QP back to her home country, Brazil. Since arriving in Brazil, she has worked hard to create a presence of the QP and FE in major cities of Rio de Janeiro, Brasilia and Sao Paulo. 

A 30 hours air journey to Brazil produced no jet lag for PD Rachel Thomas, thanks to the Quantum Pendant and Quantum Bracelets. Meanwhile Michelle paved the way for the arrival of PD Rachel Thomas who conducted a BEP for a small but enthusiastic group of QP wearers and networkers. These participants had gained wonderful benefits from the use of QP after a short time. 

Ricardo Vianna was the first QP wearer in Brazil and his quick recovery from injuries suffered from a severe car accident was a personal testimonial that influenced him to join the FE business. Brazil is an exciting country with such a diverse people and blend of cultures, receptive to energy medicine. 

Michelle Vianna will become FE's Country Licensee for Brazil and she will be strongly supported by her father Richardo Vianna. A number of stockiest will also be appointed in major cities in the coming weeks. Both are looking forward to welcome FE's CEO Paul Ting to Rio de Janeiro. 

Congratulations and best wishes to Michelle and Ricardo and a BIG THANK YOU for the time and support during PD Rachel Thomas's Brazilian visit. 

FE business development in Brazil will be exciting!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
